entries.title: Sr. Product Designer Developer
entries.description: Multi-disciplinary Designer with a strong track record of collaborating with high-performing teams to create interfaces that empower the workplace and engage users. As a tenured member of Orium, a company deeply rooted in the principles of empathy-for-all, collaboration, flexibility, and humanity, I have witnessed firsthand the evolution of our culture amidst the ever-changing tech landscape. Throughout my 10 years with Orium (previously Myplanet), I have continuously refined my expertise in UI Development and front-end polish, driving innovation and shaping new approaches to learning. Self-awareness and empathy lie at the heart of my personal and professional journey, mirroring the values that drive Orium's success.[See new language around MP on WR]
entries.callout: For the past 9 years, I've been growing alongside Orium, defining new ways of learning through UI Development and front-end polish.

entries.title: Mindfulness Facilitator
entries.description:
At Orium, I have played a pivotal role in championing mindfulness as a driving force for personal growth and the overall evolution of the company. For the past 5 years, I have been an instrumental Mindfulness Facilitator, creating a nurturing environment where individuals can learn, develop, and thrive.
As a passionate advocate for mindfulness, I am one of the key day-to-day ambassadors promoting a positive and harmonious atmosphere within our multi-disciplinary teams. Through fostering emotional intelligence and encouraging a sense of well-being, I have contributed to a culture that values good vibes and nurtures a deeper connection among team members.
By continuously supporting and encouraging mindful breaks, I have helped empower individuals to achieve their best selves, both personally and professionally. My dedication to mindfulness aligns seamlessly with Orium's vision, enhancing productivity, well-being, and overall success within the organization.
entries.callout: I'm one of many day-to-day mindfulness ambassadors promoting good-vibes and fostering emotional intelligence on multi-disciplinary teams.

entries.title: UX Designer
entries.description: This section will contain a concise description of my responsibilities and achievements during my tenure as a UX Designer at University Health Network.

entries.title: UI Designer
entries.description:
During my tenure as a UI Designer (Fellow) at Orium, I embarked on a transformative learning experience for students, recent graduates, and career changers. Collaborated with aspiring student designers to craft product pitches and interfaces, gaining real-world expertise in UI design. Honed user-centric design skills and embraced team collaboration, setting a solid foundation for future growth.

  • Unique learning opportunity for students, recent graduates, and career changers.
  • Collaborated with aspiring student designers on product pitches and interfaces.
  • Real-world experience in UI design and team collaboration.
  • Emphasized user-centric design principles.
  • Fostered creativity and collaboration.
  • Honed skills in ideation, iteration, and UI design.
  • Contributed to nurturing the next generation of design talent.
